title.oldValue: Microsoft Teams: Mixed grid view in meetings
title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: New gallery in meetings

description.oldValue: Mixed grid eases the transition from video on to video off and places everybody in a 16:9 ratio. Users can also change their grid size by choosing one of the predefined options. As the new version of Gallery, this is the default view users will have upon joining meetings. Users can choose to go back to this view through the view switcher as desired. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
description.newValue: The new gallery eases the transition from video on to video off and places everybody in a 16:9 ratio. Users can also change their gallery size by choosing one of the predefined options. Users can choose to go back to this view through the view switcher as desired. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
